ygData.subject: To Dewey/Stuff with Zardus
ygData.msgSnippet: Dewey, if you send another pointless OOC, I will moderate you. As rAuq said, use the message board. I guess I m in charge of Chaostaur for now. ... No, just

Subject: To Dewey/Stuff with Zardus
Message-ID: <9k2j46+fpmg@...>
In-Reply-To: <002301c1189f$ed43e140$0cca9d18@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 2048
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

Dewey, if you send another pointless OOC, I will moderate you. As 
rAuq said, use the message board.

I guess I'm in charge of Chaostaur for now.

::Zardus/Chaostaur::

"No, just do that and hurry," Zardus says to Chaostaur, then replies 
to Frostbite.

"I am being held up by matters at my base. Would you mind delaying 
our meeting for a few days?"

Finishing the transmission, he looks around to see if Orchestra had 
gotten on the island yet.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Abyssian Badass" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> I think that's silly though, you haven't really gotten any reasons 
or
> storyline into a rivalry with Megaton.  And like I said earlier, 
Necromancer
> should take on Megaton in one big epic battle, since if it weren't 
for
> Necromancer, Megaton wouldn't be around, and plus, I could put some 
real
> good storyline and detail into it.
